review: I ordered Amazon Fire TV on their Black Friday special, and it was a very good price.However, when I attached it to my 1080i HD TV through the television's DVI connector using the same HDMI to DVI cable I use for my DVD player, it would not work.Apparently it only works through an HDMI input, and my HD TV doesn't have an HDMI input.So in order to use my Amazon Fire TV, I will have to purchase a new television.  Bummer.It may be a while before that happens, but when I get a television with an HDMI input, I'll update this review based on what Amazon Fire TV actually does, not just on connection type.In the meantime, make sure of your television inputs before you order.
